name: Follistatin-344
overview: A naturally occurring protein that binds to and inhibits myostatin, a protein that limits muscle growth. Research has explored its potential role in muscle development and metabolic regulation.
interactions_notes: Very limited interaction data. May affect muscle and metabolic pathways. Comprehensive endocrine evaluation essential. Unknown interactions with anabolic agents.
dosing_ranges_literature: Human clinical data is extremely limited. Animal research has used varying protocols. No standardized human dosing exists. Gene therapy approaches have also been explored.
storage_notes: Store unreconstituted peptide in freezer (-20Â°C or colder). After reconstitution, store refrigerated and use within 1 week. Highly sensitive to degradation.

references.title: Follistatin and myostatin regulation
references.note: Preclinical research on follistatin's effects on muscle growth.

references.title: Myostatin inhibition strategies
references.note: Overview of myostatin inhibition approaches including follistatin.
